jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer (W/M/D)
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

You'll be joining one of the world‚Äôs largest privately owned real estate tech companies and a subsidiary of Axel Springer. Our mission is to unlock everyone‚Äôs perfect place!

You'll work across some of Europe‚Äôs best known digital real estate brands including: üá´üá∑ Meilleurs Agents, üá´üá∑ Groupe SeLoger, üáßüá™ Immoweb, üá©üá™ Immowelt, üá™üá∏ Housell and üáÆüá± Yad2.

Job Description

As a Senior Android Engineer within the AVIV Group, you will benefit from great flexibility and true experts in native technologies within a team of more than 60 mobile developers (android, ios, back-end).
‚Ä¢ Attached to the Mobile Experience Team, you will be in charge of:
‚Ä¢ Design and develop Android mobile applications for the Group's different brands
‚Ä¢ Continuously improve the quality and performance of applications
‚Ä¢ Ensure the monitoring and maintenance of the applications produced
‚Ä¢ Be a force for proposals to implement new innovative features (virtual/3D tour, voice recognition, geofencing, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Monitoring and creation of prototypes around new technological opportunities (connected watches, TV applications, Google Home, etc.)

Our technical stack :
‚Ä¢ Android Studio 4.1 / Kotlin 1.6
‚Ä¢ Partial tooling based on the Atlassian suite (Jira, Confluence)
‚Ä¢ GitHub as source code controller
‚Ä¢ MVVM + Clean Archi application architecture
‚Ä¢ Responsive programming ‚Äúcoroutines Flow‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Jetpack tools (navigation component, compose, viewmodel, room datastore,...)
‚Ä¢ White label: Design System, Atomic Design & Backend Driven Design approach
‚Ä¢ Modular feature
‚Ä¢ Dagger for dependency injection
‚Ä¢ Nexus as package manager
‚Ä¢ CI/CD via Cloud
‚Ä¢ Unit testing with JUnit and source code analysis with Sonarqube
‚Ä¢ Automated UI Testing with Espresso
‚Ä¢ Crash management with Crashlytics
‚Ä¢ Management of application tracking with GTM
‚Ä¢ Firebase for Remote Config or A/B Testing

Qualifications

The skills we are looking for:
‚Ä¢ Significant experience in developing native applications on Android (Kotlin + Compose)
‚Ä¢ Solid foundations in the particularities and constraints of application development
‚Ä¢ You love automation and dream of your code coverage
‚Ä¢ Your autonomy combined with your desire to learn and share your knowledge make you the ideal candidate for this position.
‚Ä¢ You like working in a team, are organized and know how to stay light to join a friendly and fun team.
‚Ä¢ Your obsession: damaging the Crashfree!
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of the use of REST services, the implementation of the MVVM pattern and mobile application architecture in general
‚Ä¢ Mastery of local data storage
‚Ä¢ Working in a high-load environment (several hundred thousand users each day)
‚Ä¢ Good ability to express yourself in English

Additional Information

What we offer you :
‚Ä¢ We are one of the leading PropTech platforms in Europe. If you‚Äôve ever rented or purchased a property then you may have used one of our classified portals. This is a great time to join us to help elevate our AVIV brand.
‚Ä¢ The opportunity to work hybrid within our operating footprint with international travel to our locations in France, Belgium and Germany.
‚Ä¢ The freedom to tell us which tools you need to be successful in your job so we can set you up to make it happen.

At Aviv, we are an equal opportunities employer and an organisation where everyone is welcomed to be their authentic selves. We strongly encourage individuals with visible and non visible disabilities, all educational backgrounds, people from minority backgrounds, those from the LGBTQIA+ community and parents and carers to apply. If you need reasonable adjustments at any point in the application or interview process, or wish to discuss part time or flexible working requirements, please let us know.

In your application, please feel free to note which pronouns you use (For example - she/her/hers, he/him/his, they/them/theirs, etc).

Our ambition is to be the leading Employer in PropTech across Europe and this is a pivotal time to join us and unlock your perfect job !

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product ‚Äì BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored‚Äîour team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
‚Ä¢ Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
‚Ä¢ Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
‚Ä¢ Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
‚Ä¢ Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
‚Ä¢ Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
‚Ä¢ Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
‚Ä¢ Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
‚Ä¢ Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
‚Ä¢ Are truly passionate about mobile development.
‚Ä¢ Can communicate in English (B2+).
‚Ä¢ Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
‚Ä¢ Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
‚Ä¢ An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
‚Ä¢ Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
‚Ä¢ Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù‚Äî we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT‚Äôs mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat! üòâ

This offer from "IDT Corporation" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Android Developer - Apps Team (F/M)
jobs_results.description: Job Description: Pr√™t √† vous d√©ployer ? ‚ú® Alors bienvenue chez Rakuten France ! A vous : - le projet exaltant - le mouvement et les perspectives - le plaisir de se lever le matin - le management qui fait grandir - l‚Äôenvergure et la taille humaine Si vous vous retrouvez dans nos piliers, rejoignez l‚Äô√©quipe Apps au poste d'Android Developer ! A propos de l‚Äô√©quipe Tech: Notre √©quipe de D√©veloppement a pour but d‚Äôimpl√©menter les nouvelles fonctionnalit√©s de notre site web, sa version mobile ainsi que ses applications mobiles en m√™lant du d√©veloppement Backend et Frontend. Elle met un point d‚Äôhonneur √† la technicit√© et au partage de connaissances : nos ing√©nieurs travaillent ensemble et communiquent leurs id√©es via des conf√©rences techniques internes et sujets transverses. L‚Äô√©quipe est organis√©e autour de 12 features teams (2 tribes) qui ont chacune un domaine de l‚Äôapplication, et qui sont toutes constitu√©es d‚Äôun Lead Tech, de D√©veloppeurs, d‚Äôun Product Owner et d‚Äôun QA, qui constituent le tri-amigos. A propos de la Feature Team Apps : L'√©quipe Apps, charg√©e du d√©veloppement des applications natives iOS et Android de Rakuten France, fonctionne en m√©thode agile SCRUM. Elle est constitu√©e d'une Product Owner, d'un Lead Technique, d'une Lead D√©veloppeuse Android, des D√©veloppeurs et de deux QA. De plus, vous ferez partie d'une √©quipe technique globale forte de nombreuses comp√©tences, qui se challenge et partage ses connaissances, assiste √† des conf√©rences techniques internes et sujets transverses. L'√©quipe Apps propose √† nos utilisateurs mobiles la majeure partie des features de notre marketplace, telles que les annonces, la recherche, la partie checkout (passage en caisse, m√©thodes de paiement‚Ä¶), ce qui est relatif √† notre club de fid√©lit√©, la mise en ligne d'annonces et bien d'autres ! Vos missions : √ätre impliqu√©(e) sur toutes les phases des projets, de la conception √† la production ; Participer √† la conception technique des projets et proposer des technos pour les d√©veloppements ; Contribuer aux estimations des projets pour construire la roadmap, et aider le Product Owner √† construire une roadmap r√©aliste ; D√©velopper les stories prioris√©es avec un niveau de qualit√© avanc√© (TU / TI / BDD) ; √ätre garant de la qualit√© du code : participer aux tests et √† la documentation des projets, et avoir √† c≈ìur que les nouvelles features ravissent nos utilisateur(trice)s ; Aimer √™tre en qu√™te de nouveaut√©s et am√©liorations techniques. Cette veille r√©guli√®re permettra de briller pendant nos TechWeeks ; Echanger avec les autres √©quipes de d√©veloppement afin d‚Äôapporter une exp√©rience utilisateur homog√®ne entre les diff√©rentes plateformes. Votre profil : De formation ing√©nieur Bac+5 ayant une solide exp√©rience en d√©veloppement Android (3 ans minimum). √ätre proactif(ve) et curieux(se) et aimer les technologies innovantes que vous √©tudierez et analyserez au cours de TechWeeks et lors de conventions comme les Android Makers. Aimer discuter avec les pair(e)s, et aimer √©galement √™tre incollable sur les nouvelles technos et pratiques tendances. L‚Äôanglais sera √©galement tr√®s utile pour la documentation et les pull requests. √ätre autonome tout en sachant travailler en √©quipe, organis√©(e) Environnement technique : Framework Android Kotlin / RxJava & Coroutines / Flow API Restfull BDD Room Patterns : MVVM / Repository Git (Github / Gitflow) / Jira / Firebase Int√©gration Continue (Github Actions) M√©thodologie : Agiles / Scrum / Kanban Serait un plus : Clean Archi Jetpack Compose Les Avantages de Rakuten Une politique de t√©l√©travail flexible, incluant une participation annuelle De superbes bureaux au c≈ìur de Paris (Sentier) Une carte Edenred √† utiliser pour le d√©jeuner La prise en charge des frais de transport √† 50% La mutuelle prise en charge √† 50% par Rakuten 12 RTT annuels, en plus des 25 jours de cong√©s Des moments de convivialit√© organis√©s toute l‚Äôann√©e Programme avantageux de stock-options Rakuten Group Des √©quipes multiculturelles & internationales Si vous vous reconnaissez dans ces diff√©rents points et que vous avez envie de rejoindre des √©quipes motiv√©es, talentueuses & bienveillantes alors vous √™tes la bonne personne, c‚Äôest pour vous l‚Äôoccasion de participer √† l‚Äô√©volution d‚Äôune marketplace qui met au c≈ìur de sa strat√©gie ses marchands et ses membres. Process de recrutement Echange avec C√©line, Talent Acquisition Manager Test technique Rencontre avec Pauline, Lead Dev Android et Lionel, Tech Lead IOS Rencontre avec l'√©quipe Apps : Sid-Ali, QA et Lucas, Product Owner Rakuten France recrute, reconnait et int√®gre tous les Talents. Rakuten est un leader mondial des services en ligne et l‚Äôinventeur du mod√®le de place de march√© B2B2C. Fond√© en 1997 au Japon, Rakuten propose un √©cosyst√®me de plus de 80 services digitaux compl√©mentaires, disponibles dans 30 pays, dans des domaines aussi vari√©s que l‚Äôe-commerce, les t√©l√©communications, les Fintech, la publicit√© ou encore l‚ÄôIntelligence Artificielle. En France, Rakuten est le pionner de l‚Äô√©conomie collaborative et circulaire. Sa plateforme inclusive permet aux grandes enseignes comme aux TPE/PME locales de commercialiser leurs produits √† une tr√®s large communaut√© d‚Äôacheteurs et de b√©n√©ficier d‚Äôoutils technologiques et de services innovants pour d√©velopper leur activit√©, en ligne comme en magasins, via le click & collect notamment. L‚Äôengagement de Rakuten en faveur d‚Äôun e-commerce vertueux se traduit aussi par son approche non concurrentielle, qui encourage les commer√ßants comme les particuliers √† revendre leurs produits, faisant de la plateforme un acteur majeur de la seconde main. La r√©ussite de Rakuten repose ainsi sur une double promesse : le pouvoir d‚Äôacheter et de revendre. Aujourd‚Äôhui, plus de 10 millions de Fran√ßais profitent de cet engagement via le Club R. Plus qu‚Äôun programme de fid√©lit√©, le Club R r√©compense acheteurs et vendeurs et favorise le d√©veloppement de l‚Äô√©conomie circulaire. Fid√®le √† ses valeurs fondatrices, Rakuten pr√¥ne un mod√®le de digitalisation responsable, pour les commer√ßants, pour l‚Äôenvironnement et pour le consommateur : un e-commerce qui met tout le monde d‚Äôaccord. Rakuten is a world leader in online services and the inventor of the B2B2C marketplace model. Founded in 1997 in Japan, Rakuten offers an ecosystem of over 80 complementary digital services available in 30 countries in areas as varied as online shopping, telecoms, fintech, advertising and artificial intelligence. In France, Rakuten is the pioneer of the collaborative and circular economy. Its inclusive platform enables everyone from major industrial companies to small local businesses to sell their products to a very wide community of buyers, benefiting from innovative technological tools and services to develop their business online and in store through click & collect in particular. Rakuten‚Äôs commitment to virtuous online shopping is also evident in its non-competitive approach which encourages retailers and individuals to resell their products, making the platform a key player in the second-hand sector. Rakuten‚Äôs success is founded on a two-fold promise: the power to buy and the power to resell. Today, over 10 million French people benefit from this commitment through Club R. More than a loyalty programme, Club R rewards buyers and sellers and helps the circular economy develop. Faithful to its founding values, Rakuten advocates a responsible digital model for retailers, for the environment and for the consumer: online shopping approved by everyone.

jobs_results.title: Flutter Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Portugal

The role is restricted to those physically located in Europe, while this is a remote position, we cannot consider candidates that are not based in such region. Preference will be given to candidates based in Portugal, Spain or Malta.

We are looking for an enthusiastic Flutter Mobile Developer to help maintain and develop our sports mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ As a Flutter Mobile Developer you are expected to ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢ Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code for Flutter application
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain technical documentation for the applications
‚Ä¢ Identify the causes of the most complex issues and implement practical and efficient technical solutions
‚Ä¢ Implement both backend and front-end features
‚Ä¢ Coordinate with UX/UI designers, developers, and test engineers in an Agile environment
‚Ä¢ Abide by industry and company software development standards
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews and give feedback to other developers
‚Ä¢ Understand the big picture and offer insightful advice about technologies and projects
‚Ä¢ Be proactive in identifying and communicating potential risks and issues to the team and stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Participate in sprint planning, estimation, and retrospective meetings
‚Ä¢ Keep up-to-date with the latest mobile app development trends and technologies
‚Ä¢ Work in close partnership with cross-functional teams and management
‚Ä¢ Ensure code quality by writing tests, using SonarQube, etc.
‚Ä¢ Success in this role means...
‚Ä¢ Collaborating towards a team effort to improve the overall user experience of our applications.
‚Ä¢ Developing DRY, clean, maintainable and scalable code that can be comprehended and worked on solely through documentation created.
‚Ä¢ Increasing the performance, scalability and security of our mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ You have acquired proficient communication skills in the English language through team collaboration.

This offer from "Raketech" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 86% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Cross-Platform Developer (Firebase)
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: EMEA

About us:

Talent has no borders. Proxify's mission is to connect top developers around the world with opportunities they deserve. So, it doesn't matter where you are; we are here to help you fast-track your independent career in the right direction. üôÇ

Since our launch, Proxify's developers have successfully worked with 1200+ happy clients to build their products and growth features. 3500+ talented developers trust Proxify and its network to fulfil their dreams and objectives.

Proxify is shaped by a global network of supportive, talented developers interested in remote full-time jobs. Our Glassdoor (4.5/5) and Trustpilot (4.8/5) ratings reflect the trust developers place in us and our commitment to our members' success.

The Role:

We are looking for a Senior Mobile Cross-platform Developer with strong proficiency with Firebase for one of our clients. You are a perfect candidate if you are growth-oriented, you love what you do, and you enjoy working on new ideas to develop exciting products.

What we‚Äôre looking for:
‚Ä¢ Minimum of 5 years of experience in mobile application development with a strong portfolio of released applications.
‚Ä¢ Extensive experience with Firebase services and integrations in mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in mobile development frameworks and languages such as Flutter, React Native, Swift, Kotlin, and Java.
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of testing frameworks and debugging tools for mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain high-performance mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms using Flutter, React Native, or native languages (Swift, Kotlin).
‚Ä¢ Implement and manage Firebase services such as Authentication, Firestore, Realtime Database, Cloud Functions, Cloud Messaging, and Crashlytics to enhance mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on reusability and best practices. Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing to ensure application stability and performance.
‚Ä¢ Identify and troubleshoot performance bottlenecks in mobile applications and optimise for maximum performance and user experience.

What Proxify offers
‚Ä¢ Career-accelerating positions at cutting-edge companies
‚Ä¢ Discover exclusive long-term remote engagements at the world's most interesting product companies.
‚Ä¢ Hand-picked opportunities, just for you
‚Ä¢ Skip the typical recruitment roadblocks and biases with personally matched engagements.
‚Ä¢ Fast-track your independent developer career
‚Ä¢ Start small and gain more freedom to take on new engagements as you build your independent developer career.
‚Ä¢ A recruitment process that values your time
‚Ä¢ Only one hiring process with the possibility of several positions, without any additional tests.

This offer from "Proxify" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.
